name: zettabyte/zetta-accounts
description: Zetta Accounts is a robust and user-friendly WordPress plugin designed to streamline your accounting and financial management tasks. It provides features such as real-time tracking of income and expenses, accounts payable and receivable, bank reconciliations, and financial reporting-all seamlessly integrated into your WordPress dashboard. Ideal for businesses of all sizes, Zetta Accounts simplifies accounting while ensuring data security and scalability.
